name: Roy Tang
text: Happy Easter Jonathan, excited much? One doesn't have to dive in right away  :p    Seriously, this penitensya was harder than I expected, so many times I wanted to comment on things. Especially since certain people (who shall not be named) kept going at it haha

source_obj.text: Happy Easter Jonathan, excited much? One doesn't have to dive in right away  :p    Seriously, this penitensya was harder than I expected, so many times I wanted to comment on things. Especially since certain people (who shall not be named) kept going at it haha
